name: Kuala Lumpur
description: Malaysia's capital Kuala Lumpur is known for its skyscrapers and cultural diversity. Rise to the top of the iconic Petronas Twin Towers, explore the bustling streets of Bukit Bintang, or visit the sacred Batu Caves.

name: Singapore
description: A global financial center with tropical gardens, diverse cultural enclaves, and world-class attractions like Gardens by the Bay and Universal Studios.

name: Shanghai
description: Experience the perfect blend of traditional and modern China in Shanghai, featuring the iconic Bund, ancient gardens, and towering skyscrapers.

name: Tokyo
description: Japan's busy capital mixes the ultramodern and the traditional, from neon-lit skyscrapers to historic temples. Experience unique culture, shopping, and dining.
